entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 09:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 12.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
